Description: At top 40 guitarsour customers satisfaction is our first concern.All of out items have a 14 day return policy.If after 14 days you are not completely satisfiedwith your purchase, please return it for a full refund....Peace be with you... *all returned items must be in the same condition theywere at the time of sale. All original packing must be included. #Up for Sale is a 2018 Jackson SLX X Series Soloist! Koa Top! Duncan Designed Pickups! This is really cool. You are looking at a 2018 Jackson SLX X Series Soloist. Beautiful KOA Top! Duncan Designed Humbuckers. Floyd Rose Tremolo. From The Web: Distinctive and affordable, Jackson’s X Series Soloist™ models are built for speed, and loaded with purebred Jackson DNA. The X Series Soloist™ SLX Koa features a basswood body with a gorgeous koa top, through-body maple neck with graphite reinforcement and tilt-back scarf joint headstock for greater playing comfort. Hosting 24 jumbo frets and pearloid sharkin inlays, the 12"-16" compound radius fully bound dark rosewood fingerboard curves more dramatically at the nut for easy chording and flattens out as it approaches the neck joint for low-action bends without fretting out. Duncan Designed™ alnico HB-103N (neck) and high-output ceramic HB-103B (bridge) humbucking pickups power this metal beast, which also includes single volume and tone controls, three-way blade switching and a Floyd Rose® Special double-locking two-point tremolo for rock-solid tuning stability. As well as a tonal machine, the SLX Koa is sure to draw attention for its looks - thanks to its beautifully stained Natural finish and black hardware.High-performance Guitar with Koa Top The Jackson X Series Soloist SLX solidbody electric guitar is primed for performance. The resonant growl of its koa-topped basswood body sounds killer when pumped through this axe's high-output Duncan Designed humbuckers. And a fast-playing compound-radius fretboard ensures that you put that scorching tone to good use. Experience infinite sustain, by virtue of the SLX's through-body maple neck. Guitarists here at Sweetwater make good use of the SLX's Floyd Rose Special double-locking tremolo for whammy effects and dive-bombing. And thanks to its stunning koa top, the Jackson X Series Soloist SLX solidbody electric guitar is guaranteed to attract attention.Tech Specs Body Type: Solidbody Body Shape: Soloist Left-/Right-handed: Right-handed Number of Strings: 6 Body Material: Basswood Top Material: Koa Body Finish: Satin Color: Natural Neck Material: 1-piece Maple Neck Shape: Speed neck profile, Neck-thru Radius: 12"-16" compound Fingerboard Material: Dark Rosewood Fingerboard Inlay: Pearloid Sharkfin Number of Frets: 24, Jumbo Scale Length: 25.5" Nut Width: 1.6875" Nut Material: Locking nut Bridge/Tailpiece: Floyd Rose Special Double-locking 2-Point Tremolo Tuners: Jackson sealed die-cast Neck Pickup: Duncan designed HB-103n Humbucker Bridge Pickup: Duncan designed HB-103b Humbucker Controls: 1 x volume, 1 x tone, 3-way blade pickup switch Our luthier did a complete setup. Brand new strings were installed. Gig ready on Arrival! Stand Out From The Crowd! Serial Number: #ICJ1851333 Weight: 7.90 lbs. Case is NOT Included Due to CITES Treaty for Endangered Wood (Mahogany, Rosewood) We no longer ship out of the USA. Cosmetics: Excellent Condition. Pristine. Dripping with "Mojo". It is used. Not perfect. Overall, a really nice guitar. Look at the pictures closely. They will tell the story. Top 40 guitars is a Veteran owned business.
